name: Cerkitdailyverseforpebble
tagline: A daily verse for the Pebble smartwatch
body:
## [cerkit.com](http://cerkit.com) Daily Bible Verse.
#### Powered by Bible.org

This is an app for the Pebble smartwatch that displays a daily Bible verse from Bible.org. It can also display a random verse. It works on the original Pebble as well as the new Pebble Time.

Scripture quoted by permission. All scripture quotations, unless otherwise indicated, are taken from the NET Bible® copyright ©1996-2006 by Biblical Studies Press, L.L.C. All rights reserved.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
